title: Hot Springs National Park: Join Our Friends
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends      Friends of Hot Springs National Park  The Friends group was organized in 1987 for the purpose of partnering with the National Park Service in the preservation of the historic bathhouses and the rehabilitation of the landscaped grounds.  A nonprofit organization, the Friends bring alive the spirit and pride found in Hot Springs for our National Park. Through individual and corporate donations and fund-raising activities, the Friends host special events and make acquisitions for the park.
